headline: PayPal Leadership Reset Puts Culture And Core Payments Back In Focus
summary: PayPal Holdings (NasdaqGS:PYPL) has named Enrique Lores as its new CEO, replacing the current leadership team. The leadership change follows weak financial results, market share pressures in branded checkout and public criticism from former president David Marcus. Concerns highlighted include cultural drift at PayPal, slower product execution and a limited response to the growth of Buy Now, Pay Later offerings. The board selected Lores, known for leading transformation efforts at HP, to...
